\## {{< fa basket-shopping >}} Ingredients

-   ingredients
-   [ ] 1 ripe avocado
-   [ ] 2 slices of bread
-   [ ] Salt to taste
-   [ ] Pepper to taste
-   [ ] Lemon juice

## {{< fa kitchen-set >}} Procedure

1.  Step 1 Toast the slices of bread to your desired level of crispiness.
2.  Step 2 Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl. Mash the avocado with a fork until smooth.
3.  Step 3 Spread the mashed avocado evenly onto the toasted bread slices. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add a squeeze of lemon juice if desired for extra flavor.
